author: 0xraino
content: <@!393119312350543872> fyi, <@!211091239112671234> and I were talking about potentially adding tests that test the presence/absence of precompiles in the first *n* addresses.

author: dimitry8570
content: You mean a single test just to see if its enabled/disabled?

author: holiman
content: Just a single test or a group of tests that does a 21k-call to the addresses 0x00 to 0xFF, basically. That _ought_ to cover it. The precompiles will fail (too low gas), the non-precompiles will not fail.
